name: all4rest
overview:
all4rest.com is a unique system which helps people to book their favourite table fast and simple. Also we give restaurants very simple tools to create guest database, send emails and birthday cards, create best deals, and fill empty tables in a days and times they choose.

Problem

‐ before you finally book a table you should call to the restaurant and find available places. This is very hard thing to do and eats a lot of time. You simply can’t choose the place by phone.

‐ restaurants hope to attract diners by paying for internet catalogue services but have no instrument to check the real numbers.

Solution

Single booking system provides an ability to automate booking process and serves for internet catalogues monitoring.
